name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

name: Village Idiot
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

name: Knight
ability: You start knowing two players that are not the Demon.

name: Steward
ability: You start knowing one good player.

name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

name: Ogre
ability: On your first night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

firstNightReminder: Choose your Minions (before the first night)
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

name: Lord of Typhon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]

name: Gardener
ability: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.

otherNightReminder: if it is before the final day, all dead players without a vote token regain it.
name: Ferryman
ability: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

name: Momma Monsta
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die and their neighbors might not wake. Whoever holds the Lil' Monsta may become the Momma Monsta. [You start as a Minion, +The Lil' Monsta]

name: Conscripter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, they might become evil.

name: Gorewhel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Each night*, choose a word: the first person to say that word tomorrow might die.

name: Wreckage
ability: If more than one evil player is executed, evil wins. After day 5, good wins. [One Townsfolk is evil and learns Minion information]

name: Voyager
ability: The Demon and Minions are not informed. Each night, choose a player: they turn evil. Evil wins if no good players live. [Players (not you) have arbitrary alignments]

name: Shadow
ability: Every even night*, choose a player: they die. Every odd night, you get the ability of a Demon bluff until dusk.

name: Governer
ability: Every even night, choose a player: they die. You die if and only if all Minions are dead.

name: Embezzler
ability: Each night*, choose two players: the first dies, the second is poisoned until dusk and gain their ability.

name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might be woken to decide the outcome of arbitrary abilities.

name: Vulture
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die and you learn their character. Once per game, you may choose to gain the ability of your most recent kill. Outsiders you kill might turn evil. [-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Choose someone (or two people if able)
name: Lionsmane
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If any of the players you chose last night are alive, choose two instead.

name: Archbishop
ability: Each night, propose a decree to the Storyteller: it may be carried out. Each night*, choose a player: they die.

name: Sonsam
ability: Each night, choose a player: your registration is inverse and your previously chosen player dies. If there are five or more living players (not Travelers) and you die, your last chosen player becomes the Evil Sonsam with the ability “Each night*, an arbitrary amount of players die.”.

name: Matriarch
ability: You start knowing all in-play characters and you may decide the order they die in. Each night*, a living player dies in this order. The first Minion this kills becomes the Matriarch and you die instead.

name: Mikhil
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may choose for your next player to be poisoned and register as alive while dead.
flavor: What do you mean, I can't use corpses as fertilizer?

name: Mayor
ability: Minions are informed of each other's characters. Each night*, choose a player: they die. [+1 Minion, Minions choose which Minion is the Mayor]

name: Pukka [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned until dusk, then die. You can act on the 1st night.

name: Zombuul [OMR]
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose two players: they die. The first time you die, you do not, but appear to.

name: Shabaloth [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they die. 1 player might be regurgitated at dusk (even if they were dead when chosen).

name: Po [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Or, choose no-one tonight & 3 players tomorrow night.

name: Comintern
ability: You know 1 Comintern and 1 Good player. Each night*, you might die. Evil wins only when no Good players live (except Travelers). You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Comintern]

name: Draconis
ability: Each night*, choose a character: if in play, they die and an Evil player gains their character(s) in addition to their own. If not, a player dies.

name: Seclorum
ability: Each night*, you may ask the Storyteller one question about each player you whispered today. Then choose a player: they die.

name: Kabal
ability: Each night*, send 10 words to anyone, then choose a player: they die. If an Outsider was most responsible for Good losing, they switch teams & win, unless they dropped The Bomb. [+1 Outsider]

name: LIZARD (D)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Evremore
ability: Each Night* choose a player: they die, and you may choose to permanently gain their ability in addition to your own. [-1 Outsider]

name: Saboteur
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they might die at any time. Once you have chosen all living players, everyone learns this and Evil wins at dusk.

name: Executioner
ability: Each night, choose a living player: your previously chosen player dies. If your previously chosen player is already dead, their Townsfolk neighbors die instead.

name: Fárbauti
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. Each night*, if a player you have poisoned is chosen, they die.

name: Dustdevil
ability: If a player misregisters as or believes they are character, they might gain that character's ability.

name: Third Party
ability: Players may be secretly assigned Travelers at setup. If a player is assigned a Traveler this way, they have a specific win condition to fulfill that is beyond that of good or evil.

name: Haunted Keyboard
ability: Something bad happens to players that don't send at least a certain number of messages a day.

name: Forbidden Treatise
ability: If everyone wins, everyone loses. If any deal is suggested or struck as to create a situation where every player would win, the teams involved lose.

name: WWW - Bootlegger
ability: The game will not end until the Demon dies, Storyteller is executed, or there are two or less players living. Any alternate wincon that occurs will flip whoever wins when the game ends. The Leviathan is announced regardless of sobriety.

name: The Bomb
ability: If 2 players agree to drop The Bomb, and at least 1 is good, evil wins. Then, if evil ≥ good players, whoever wins, loses, and whoever loses, wins.

name: High Priestess
ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

name: Village Idiot
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

name: Shugenja
ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

name: Banshee
ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

name: Knight
ability: You start knowing two players that are not the Demon.

name: Steward
ability: You start knowing one good player.

name: Alsaahir
ability: Once per day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

name: Ogre
ability: On your first night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

name: Zealot
ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

name: Harpy
ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

name: Yaggababble
ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

firstNightReminder: Choose your Minions (before the first night)
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

name: Lord of Typhon
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]

name: Gardener
ability: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.

otherNightReminder: if it is before the final day, all dead players without a vote token regain it.
name: Ferryman
ability: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

name: Momma Monsta
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die and their neighbors might not wake. Whoever holds the Lil' Monsta may become the Momma Monsta. [You start as a Minion, +The Lil' Monsta]

name: Conscripter
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, they might become evil.

name: Gorewhel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Each night*, choose a word: the first person to say that word tomorrow might die.

name: Wreckage
ability: If more than one evil player is executed, evil wins. After day 5, good wins. [One Townsfolk is evil and learns Minion information]

name: Voyager
ability: The Demon and Minions are not informed. Each night, choose a player: they turn evil. Evil wins if no good players live. [Players (not you) have arbitrary alignments]

name: Shadow
ability: Every even night*, choose a player: they die. Every odd night, you get the ability of a Demon bluff until dusk.

name: Governer
ability: Every even night, choose a player: they die. You die if and only if all Minions are dead.

name: Embezzler
ability: Each night*, choose two players: the first dies, the second is poisoned until dusk and gain their ability.

name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You might be woken to decide the outcome of arbitrary abilities.

name: Vulture
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die and you learn their character. Once per game, you may choose to gain the ability of your most recent kill. Outsiders you kill might turn evil. [-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Choose someone (or two people if able)
name: Lionsmane
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If any of the players you chose last night are alive, choose two instead.

name: Archbishop
ability: Each night, propose a decree to the Storyteller: it may be carried out. Each night*, choose a player: they die.

name: Sonsam
ability: Each night, choose a player: your registration is inverse and your previously chosen player dies. If there are five or more living players (not Travelers) and you die, your last chosen player becomes the Evil Sonsam with the ability “Each night*, an arbitrary amount of players die.”.

name: Matriarch
ability: You start knowing all in-play characters and you may decide the order they die in. Each night*, a living player dies in this order. The first Minion this kills becomes the Matriarch and you die instead.

name: Mikhil
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may choose for your next player to be poisoned and register as alive while dead.
flavor: What do you mean, I can't use corpses as fertilizer?

name: Mayor
ability: Minions are informed of each other's characters. Each night*, choose a player: they die. [+1 Minion, Minions choose which Minion is the Mayor]

name: Pukka [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned until dusk, then die. You can act on the 1st night.

name: Zombuul [OMR]
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose two players: they die. The first time you die, you do not, but appear to.

name: Shabaloth [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they die. 1 player might be regurgitated at dusk (even if they were dead when chosen).

name: Po [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Or, choose no-one tonight & 3 players tomorrow night.

name: Comintern
ability: You know 1 Comintern and 1 Good player. Each night*, you might die. Evil wins only when no Good players live (except Travelers). You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Comintern]

name: Draconis
ability: Each night*, choose a character: if in play, they die and an Evil player gains their character(s) in addition to their own. If not, a player dies.

name: Seclorum
ability: Each night*, you may ask the Storyteller one question about each player you whispered today. Then choose a player: they die.

name: Kabal
ability: Each night*, send 10 words to anyone, then choose a player: they die. If an Outsider was most responsible for Good losing, they switch teams & win, unless they dropped The Bomb. [+1 Outsider]

name: LIZARD (D)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Evremore
ability: Each Night* choose a player: they die, and you may choose to permanently gain their ability in addition to your own. [-1 Outsider]

name: Saboteur
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they might die at any time. Once you have chosen all living players, everyone learns this and Evil wins at dusk.

name: Executioner
ability: Each night, choose a living player: your previously chosen player dies. If your previously chosen player is already dead, their Townsfolk neighbors die instead.

name: Fárbauti
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. Each night*, if a player you have poisoned is chosen, they die.

name: Dustdevil
ability: If a player misregisters as or believes they are character, they might gain that character's ability.

name: Third Party
ability: Players may be secretly assigned Travelers at setup. If a player is assigned a Traveler this way, they have a specific win condition to fulfill that is beyond that of good or evil.

name: Haunted Keyboard
ability: Something bad happens to players that don't send at least a certain number of messages a day.

name: Forbidden Treatise
ability: If everyone wins, everyone loses. If any deal is suggested or struck as to create a situation where every player would win, the teams involved lose.

name: WWW - Bootlegger
ability: The game will not end until the Demon dies, Storyteller is executed, or there are two or less players living. Any alternate wincon that occurs will flip whoever wins when the game ends. The Leviathan is announced regardless of sobriety.

name: The Bomb
ability: If 2 players agree to drop The Bomb, and at least 1 is good, evil wins. Then, if evil ≥ good players, whoever wins, loses, and whoever loses, wins.

name: Lumberjack
ability: Each night*, choose someone: they do not wake tonight.

name: Faceswapper
ability: You might register as the Demon and the Demon may might as a Minion.

name: Disguiser
ability: Each night, choose a player: you will register as them and they will register as you to any Good abilities until dawn. If your chosen person dies at night, you are poisoned until dawn. Otherwise, you are sober.
flavor: The lost art of disguise; give me 10 minutes. I can fix your looks.

name: Antisexual
ability: If Good players talk about sex or are horny, something bad may happen. You learn what happens to who.

name: Duolaty
ability: You start knowing the players that have the character you doubled. Once per game, at night, choose a learned player: they are poisoned. [A character is doubled]

name: Poltergeist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they become an evil Minion (unless this would make too many). [You are the only Minion]

name: Swashbuckler
ability: You start knowing one Minion and their character. For each dead Minion, at night*, choose a player: they die. One player registers as a Minion to your ability.

name: Thug
ability: You start knowing the number of in-play Outsiders. When an Outsider dies, choose a player: they are poisoned. [+1 or -1 Outsider]

name: Mole
ability: You have a not-in-play Townsfolk ability. You might register as Good, a Townsfolk or an Outsider, even if dead.

name: Mercenary
ability: Every even night, choose a player and guess their character: if you guess correctly, they are poisoned.

name: Poacher
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die and you gain their ability.

name: Joker
ability: You do not know your ability. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess your ability: if you are correct, your team wins. One good player knows you are in-play.

name: Werewolf
ability: Once per game, at night, choose to have all Townsfolk abilities yield false info until dusk. While dead, one player receives false info.

name: Agent
ability: Each night, you learn part of the Grimoire. Your living neighbors might register falsely to Good abilities.
flavor: Let me collect the information. Put the pieces together.

name: Godfather [OMR]
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in-play. If 1 is executed, a player dies at midnight. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Devil's Advocate [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player (not the same as last night): if executed tomorrow, a different player dies instead at midnight.

name: Assassin [OMR]
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they are poisoned & die.

name: Mastermind [OMR]
ability: If the Demon dies by execution, play for one more day. If a good player is executed, evil wins.

name: Agitprop
ability: Each night, choose a player and a statement: that player is “mad” that statement is true tomorrow, or might be executed.

name: Brainwasher
ability: Townsfolk might receive the incorrect character in setup (their abilities work normally).

name: Templar
ability: If an Evil player nominates and executes a Good player they did not whisper today, Evil wins. Each day, if no-one dies, Evil wins.

name: Chairman
ability: You know which players are Outsiders. Once per game at night*, call Minions to a meeting. By majority vote, you may swap the Demon with a Good Outsider. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: LIZARD (M)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Crispers
ability: Your setup modification is one that is in-play. You learn what it is. [?]

name: Fire Whirl
ability: Each night, choose three Good characters (different from last): if any are in-play, you learn which, who is which, and may choose one: you gain the ability and may register as this character and good until dusk. [+1 Outsider]

name: Patron
ability: Each night, you may choose a character: anything anyone was mad about involving this character until dusk may become true. If you chose a character the previous night, a Good player learns this.

name: Censor
ability: Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each night, you learn true information that would have been received by any in-play Townsfolk.

name: Vigilante
ability: Each night, choose a player: the first player (not the Demon) who votes for them tomorrow dies.

firstNightReminder: Learns the character that is playing for the Storyteller; the player playing for the Storyteller learns this and receives the Grimoire.
name: Tourist
ability: You learn an in-play character. Whoever starts the game with that character learns the Grimoire and plays for the Storyteller. [+1 Storyteller]

name: Copycat
ability: Each night, choose someone: you might receive reminder tokens they have. If you become drunk or poisoned this way, someone else will instead of you.

name: Siren
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn a fact that no other on-script Townsfolk could learn with their ability, but something bad for your team happens to them.

name: Rival
ability: You start knowing a player: if they are alive when the game ends, your team loses.

name: Traitor
ability: You think you are the Demon but you are not. The Evil team knows who you are and who you choose at night. The players you see know who you are and if they reveal the Traitor is in-play, they might be executed.

otherNightReminder: Learns their statement (if first night) and if their statement is true
name: Cop
ability: You start knowing a statement. If it is false when the Demon is executed (ending the game), your team loses, even when dead. Each night, you learn the validity of your statement.
flavor: You! You're under arrest!

name: Sacrifice
ability: If you die, the Demon acts twice the coming night.

name: Arms Dealer
ability: Each night*, choose a unique living player (not yourself): if they are Evil, they may choose a player: they die.
flavor: I don't sell no guns to no criminals.

firstNightReminder: Drunk the Addict or their choice
otherNightReminder: Drunk the Addict or their choice
name: Addict
ability: You have the ability of and believe you are an out-of-play Townsfolk. If you choose a Townsfolk that has yet to act tonight, they are drunk until dawn. Otherwise, you are drunk until dawn.
flavor: Sometimes the drugs take such a hold... I'll blackout and end up somewhere else.

name: Tarot Reader
ability: On your first night, choose an alive player (not yourself): if they die, one player is drunk and another receives false information, even if you are dead.
flavor: The cards... the cards... the cards will tell... your past, your present, and your future as well.

name: Tinker [OMR]
ability: You might die at any time.

name: Gossip [OMR]
ability: If there is no execution, or if you are executed, a good player dies at midnight.

name: Goon [OMR]
ability: If a player ability targets you specifically, you are not affected & you become their alignment.

name: Lunatic [OMR]
ability: You think you are the Demon, but your Demon ability malfunctions. [+1 Demon, -1 Lunatic]

name: Libertine
ability: You think you are a Townsfolk until you die, and have their аbility. Each night*, even if you are dead, the Drunk token moves to a Townsfolk the Drunk whispered today. [You start Drunk]

name: Activist
ability: Each night*, a player dies unless a living player was “mad” about being the Activist today, even if you are dead.

name: M.A.D. Man
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not yourself or Travelers): if either of you are executed tomorrow, you must ask to drop the Bomb with them.

name: Sympathizer
ability: A Townsfolk is Evil, but thinks they are Good. You copy their ability, and the Demon knows them. [1 Townsfolk is Evil Defector]

name: LIZARD (O)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Jolly Lad
ability: One of your living neighbours is drunk, even if dead. Each night, the other neighbour may become drunk instead.

name: Patient 0
ability: Townsfolk that choose you will be drunk until dusk. Townsfolk that haven chosen you twice may die. If you are executed, you keep your ability.

name: Slanderer
ability: Each day, publicly guess a unique player's character: the first time you guess a Good player's character incorrectly, you learn this. The coming night, and you both might be simultaneously executed at any time.

name: Echo Chamber
ability: Each night*, learn a statement another player was mad about yesterday: you are mad that this is true, otherwise you might die tonight. While dead, a player might act twice but might die at any time.

name: Night Owl
ability: Once, during the day, visit the Storyteller: you die and tonight will be skipped, but the Demon may act twice tomorrow.

name: Carpenter
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): if not the Demon, they don't wake tonight.

name: Author
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player (not yourself) and a Good character they become (if not in play).

name: Templar
ability: You start knowing two people, both of which are not and are immune to becoming the Demon. Each night, choose someone: they cannot become the Demon tonight.

name: Clown
ability: Each night*, choose someone: you learn a riddle about them.

name: Statistician
ability: Each night, learn a statistic concerning the gamestate.

name: Chamberlain
ability: Each night, choose someone: when you die, you learn how many are Evil.

name: Optimist
ability: If you are mad about nothing going wrong, something good might happen. You learn a clue about this.

name: Lawyer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player to be safe from execution the following day. If they are executed and it fails, you have your ability back.

name: Jailor
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: you learn their character and they might die.

name: Demonologist
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: you become their alignment and may choose a character of that alignment (not a Demon) to gain the ability of.

name: Corsair
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they and only they die.

name: Shipwright
ability: Once per game, at during the day, visit the Storyteller to learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither. If your team is losing, you may propose a change to the gamestate that the Storyteller may decide to veto.

name: Navigator
ability: Each night*, you provide the Storyteller a statement that is either true or false: they will provide a statement that is of the same truthfulness.

name: Quartermaster
ability: You and an aligned player start knowing each other.

name: Jester
ability: You believe you are, have the ability of, and register as an Evil Demon. [-1 Outsider, -1 Demon]

name: Trapezist
ability: Each night*, if either of your neighbors are drunk or poisoned, you die. You learn who was drunk or poisoned and how.

name: Turncoat
ability: You believe you are and have the ability of an in-play Minion. You and the Minion you believe you are do not know the Demon and other Minions, and vice versa. You learn you are the Turncoat if you die.

name: Officer
ability: Each night*, choose someone: their ability will be redirected to help their team. Targeting a role that acts during the day will redirect if they use their ability the coming day. Your ability may fail if it causes a paradox.

name: Shuttle Driver
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn who they should choose to best help their team.
flavor: Shuttle's here! Leaving in 20!

name: Founder
ability: Every night*, someone knows you are the Founder. [+The Mercenary]

otherNightReminder: Wake and collectively choose a player
name: Acolyte
ability: Each night*, living Acolytes choose a player & learn 1 character for each, 1 being correct. 1 Acolyte might be evil [+1 or +2 Acolytes]

name: Medic
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they cannot die tonight.
flavor: The animals of this woods are dangerous. The wounds I've had to patch up...

name: Ranger
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn a player they chose. If they chose nobody or are the Demon, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Leave nothing but footprints, they say. Well, tire tracks are close enough.

name: Falconer
ability: Each night, choose a living player. If your previously chosen player is dead, learn their character.
flavor: The stench of death really gets the falcons in a stir. They often hunt the smaller scavengers that surround corpses.

name: Bird Watcher
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn a hint about their character.
flavor: What birds fly above someone can tell a great lot about what they're up to.

name: Hawkeye
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn on a scale of 1-5 how much they lied yesterday. If they didn't lie, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Constantly watching is the best way to sniff out lies.

firstNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise
otherNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise
name: Census Officer
ability: One player starts marked with 'Census'. Each night, learn the character type that is marked, and then the mark moves once clockwise (skipping Travelers).

name: Camper
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from Minions.
flavor: Sometimes a campfire is the easiest way to keep the evil ones at bay.

name: Rescue Pilot
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): all other players who chose them are drunk until dawn.
flavor: Whirrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr

otherNightReminder: An Evil player dies if you are chosen by a Demon
name: Cryptozoologist
ability: The first night* the Demon chooses you, they don't and an Evil player dies.
flavor: I'll find it. Don't you even question. See this footprint, here? Proof!

name: Consultant
ability: Each night, choose a Townsfolk: you learn a piece of advice for them.
flavor: The book. The book knows it all.

name: Coroner
ability: Each night*, choose a dead player: You learn if they died to a Good or Evil ability and you learn one Good and one Evil character, one of which is correct.
flavor: How someone died can tell you quite a bit about the motives of the killer.

name: Vigilante
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: if not the Demon, they die.
flavor: Sometimes you need to take justice into your own hands.

name: Ghost
ability: On the first night, you die.

name: Captain
ability: On your first day, all players vote for a player: they become the Captain and you change characters. You may nominate twice.

name: Grandmother [OMR]
ability: You start knowing a good player & character. If you die, they die at midnight.

name: Sailor [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose whether you or or a random good player is drunk until dusk. You can not die.

name: Preacher [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player: all chosen Minions know who you are & have no ability until you die.

name: Exorcist [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: the Demon, if chosen, knows who you are & does not wake tonight.

name: Innkeeper [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose two players: they are safe from the Demon tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

name: Chambermaid [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they wake tonight, you die.

name: Gambler [OMR]
ability: Each night*, choose a player & their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

name: Professor [OMR]
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected & regain their ability.

name: Moonchild [OMR]
ability: When you or 1 of your alive neighbors is executed, publicly choose a player who voted: if evil, they die at midnight.

name: Minstrel [OMR]
ability: At night, if an evil player was executed today, all players [not latecomers] are drunk until dusk.

name: Tea Lady [OMR]
ability: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can not die.

name: Choirboy [OMR]
ability: You can not die. If you imply you are the Choirboy, lose your ability.

name: Fool [OMR]
ability: The first time you die, you do not.

name: Wiretap (D)
ability: You start knowing 2 allied players. When they both die, you learn their characters.

name: Wiretap (F)
ability: You start knowing 2 opposite players. When you die, you learn the Evil character.

name: Double Agent
ability: The Demon sees you instead of a Minion. That Minion does not know the Evil team.

name: Sleeper
ability: You think you are an in-play Minion. Neither of you know the Evil team. If you are “mad” about your character token, you learn the in-play Demon tonight.

name: Jurist
ability: Each night, choose a player and learn their character. Good living players register falsely.

name: Freelancer
ability: Each night, choose a Good character and learn who it is (arbitrary if not in play). Once per game, learn falsely.

name: Blacklister
ability: Each night*, choose an Evil character. You learn a character they whispered today (arbitrary if not in play).

name: Black Ops
ability: Each night*, you learn whether you whispered the Demon today.

name: Populist
ability: Each night*, you learn a character who was “mad” about being the Populist today.

name: Diplomat
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn something about each player you whispered today, in no particular order.

name: Eavesdropper
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to broker a deal between 2 other players (different from yesterday). Non-Travelers who break the deal today are drunk until dawn.

name: Symbologist
ability: If you die at night, you may guess everyone's character. You learn how many you got correct.

name: Truther
ability: You have 3 Townsfolk abilities, but 1 malfunctions. You also register as the functioning Townsfolk.

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: LIZARD (T)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Scavenger
ability: You have the ability of the first evil player that dies. While all evil players are alive, your ability malfuntions.

name: White Knight
ability: Any action that targets or registers you might target or register an evil player instead, even if you are dead.

name: Fish Vendor
ability: Each night, choose a unique player: you gain a piece of advice (involving them) to help your team win. If you chose an Evil player, you are drunk.

firstNightReminder: Learns a false copy of the Grimoire
otherNightReminder: Learns a false copy of the Grimoire
name: Sculptor
ability: Each night, learn a Grimoire that shares exactly three tokens with the true Grimoire.

name: Teacher
ability: You start knowing a Good player who has an Evil neighbor.

name: Shikari
ability: A Minion and the evil team don't learn each other until you lose your ability. Each night, choose a player: If the player is the affected minion, they choose a player: if they do not choose you, they lose their ability permanently.

name: Rosemary
ability: You start knowing one Good player. If you nominate and execute them, you learn the Demon is one of two players. If you are mad that you are the Rosemary, you might lose your ability.

name: Enchanter
ability: Each night, choose a player and a character: if they are mad that they are this character tomorrow, their ability may trigger twice until the next dawn.

name: Historian
ability: Each night*, choose a player: you learn the most important thing they've done to help their team.

name: Insomniac
ability: The first time you die at night, you don't, and a good player learns who you are.

name: Crusader
ability: Each night, choose a player: Minions whose actions that target or register them are are drunk. You are safe from Minions.

name: Therapist
ability: Each night* choose a living player. Learn which character impacted them the most through an ability. If none, learn false info.

name: Combatant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they cannot die until dawn. A player who chooses your chosen may player dies (once). You are sober and healthy.

name: Mercenary
ability: You start knowing two opposing players. If the one opposite to your alignment dies, choose two players tonight: they die. If the player of your alignment dies, you die tonight.
flavor: "Gold is more valuable than blood."

name: Tour Guide
ability: You start knowing a secret word. Each night*, any players who said your secret word yesterday might die.

name: Vampire
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die. If they live, you may choose again. They will die the next time chosen by a death-inducing ability, even if unable to or the user is drunk or poisoned.

name: Botanist
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are sober and receive true information or they are drunk or poisoned until dusk.

name: Forager
ability: One player starts with the Forage token. Each night, learn a player: they learned a hint about who holds the Forage token. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess who holds the Forage token: if correct, your team wins.

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: President
ability: Each day, you may publicly make a promise. If a player catches you breaking a promise, you can’t vote today. If none catch you, you switch teams. [No starting info]

name: Celebrity
ability: Each night*, until dusk, a player who was “mad” about everything you said today acts twice.

name: Interpol
ability: Each day, you may interrogate the players involved about any one whisper. If any are executed today, you learn whether any of them lied to you.

name: United Nations
ability: Each day, if all living players vote to ratify you, you run nominations, and you may change the nomination and voting rules, except on yourself.

name: Spymaster
ability: Each night*, players may secretly message you. Then, you may choose one who did: they change characters.

name: LIZARD (Trav)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Barnacle
ability: Each night*, learn the character of someone who voted today: they might die.

name: Lumberjack
ability: Each night*, choose someone: they do not wake tonight.

name: Faceswapper
ability: You might register as the Demon and the Demon may might as a Minion.

name: Disguiser
ability: Each night, choose a player: you will register as them and they will register as you to any Good abilities until dawn. If your chosen person dies at night, you are poisoned until dawn. Otherwise, you are sober.
flavor: The lost art of disguise; give me 10 minutes. I can fix your looks.

name: Antisexual
ability: If Good players talk about sex or are horny, something bad may happen. You learn what happens to who.

name: Duolaty
ability: You start knowing the players that have the character you doubled. Once per game, at night, choose a learned player: they are poisoned. [A character is doubled]

name: Poltergeist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they become an evil Minion (unless this would make too many). [You are the only Minion]

name: Swashbuckler
ability: You start knowing one Minion and their character. For each dead Minion, at night*, choose a player: they die. One player registers as a Minion to your ability.

name: Thug
ability: You start knowing the number of in-play Outsiders. When an Outsider dies, choose a player: they are poisoned. [+1 or -1 Outsider]

name: Mole
ability: You have a not-in-play Townsfolk ability. You might register as Good, a Townsfolk or an Outsider, even if dead.

name: Mercenary
ability: Every even night, choose a player and guess their character: if you guess correctly, they are poisoned.

name: Poacher
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die and you gain their ability.

name: Joker
ability: You do not know your ability. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess your ability: if you are correct, your team wins. One good player knows you are in-play.

name: Werewolf
ability: Once per game, at night, choose to have all Townsfolk abilities yield false info until dusk. While dead, one player receives false info.

name: Agent
ability: Each night, you learn part of the Grimoire. Your living neighbors might register falsely to Good abilities.
flavor: Let me collect the information. Put the pieces together.

name: Godfather [OMR]
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in-play. If 1 is executed, a player dies at midnight. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: Devil's Advocate [OMR]
ability: Each night, choose a player (not the same as last night): if executed tomorrow, a different player dies instead at midnight.

name: Assassin [OMR]
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they are poisoned & die.

name: Mastermind [OMR]
ability: If the Demon dies by execution, play for one more day. If a good player is executed, evil wins.

name: Agitprop
ability: Each night, choose a player and a statement: that player is “mad” that statement is true tomorrow, or might be executed.

name: Brainwasher
ability: Townsfolk might receive the incorrect character in setup (their abilities work normally).

name: Templar
ability: If an Evil player nominates and executes a Good player they did not whisper today, Evil wins. Each day, if no-one dies, Evil wins.

name: Chairman
ability: You know which players are Outsiders. Once per game at night*, call Minions to a meeting. By majority vote, you may swap the Demon with a Good Outsider. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

name: LIZARD (M)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Crispers
ability: Your setup modification is one that is in-play. You learn what it is. [?]

name: Fire Whirl
ability: Each night, choose three Good characters (different from last): if any are in-play, you learn which, who is which, and may choose one: you gain the ability and may register as this character and good until dusk. [+1 Outsider]

name: Patron
ability: Each night, you may choose a character: anything anyone was mad about involving this character until dusk may become true. If you chose a character the previous night, a Good player learns this.

name: Censor
ability: Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each night, you learn true information that would have been received by any in-play Townsfolk.

name: Vigilante
ability: Each night, choose a player: the first player (not the Demon) who votes for them tomorrow dies.

firstNightReminder: Learns the character that is playing for the Storyteller; the player playing for the Storyteller learns this and receives the Grimoire.
name: Tourist
ability: You learn an in-play character. Whoever starts the game with that character learns the Grimoire and plays for the Storyteller. [+1 Storyteller]

name: Copycat
ability: Each night, choose someone: you might receive reminder tokens they have. If you become drunk or poisoned this way, someone else will instead of you.

name: Siren
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn a fact that no other on-script Townsfolk could learn with their ability, but something bad for your team happens to them.

name: Rival
ability: You start knowing a player: if they are alive when the game ends, your team loses.

name: Traitor
ability: You think you are the Demon but you are not. The Evil team knows who you are and who you choose at night. The players you see know who you are and if they reveal the Traitor is in-play, they might be executed.

otherNightReminder: Learns their statement (if first night) and if their statement is true
name: Cop
ability: You start knowing a statement. If it is false when the Demon is executed (ending the game), your team loses, even when dead. Each night, you learn the validity of your statement.
flavor: You! You're under arrest!

name: Sacrifice
ability: If you die, the Demon acts twice the coming night.

name: Arms Dealer
ability: Each night*, choose a unique living player (not yourself): if they are Evil, they may choose a player: they die.
flavor: I don't sell no guns to no criminals.

firstNightReminder: Drunk the Addict or their choice
otherNightReminder: Drunk the Addict or their choice
name: Addict
ability: You have the ability of and believe you are an out-of-play Townsfolk. If you choose a Townsfolk that has yet to act tonight, they are drunk until dawn. Otherwise, you are drunk until dawn.
flavor: Sometimes the drugs take such a hold... I'll blackout and end up somewhere else.

name: Tarot Reader
ability: On your first night, choose an alive player (not yourself): if they die, one player is drunk and another receives false information, even if you are dead.
flavor: The cards... the cards... the cards will tell... your past, your present, and your future as well.

name: Tinker [OMR]
ability: You might die at any time.

name: Gossip [OMR]
ability: If there is no execution, or if you are executed, a good player dies at midnight.

name: Goon [OMR]
ability: If a player ability targets you specifically, you are not affected & you become their alignment.

name: Lunatic [OMR]
ability: You think you are the Demon, but your Demon ability malfunctions. [+1 Demon, -1 Lunatic]

name: Libertine
ability: You think you are a Townsfolk until you die, and have their аbility. Each night*, even if you are dead, the Drunk token moves to a Townsfolk the Drunk whispered today. [You start Drunk]

name: Activist
ability: Each night*, a player dies unless a living player was “mad” about being the Activist today, even if you are dead.

name: M.A.D. Man
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not yourself or Travelers): if either of you are executed tomorrow, you must ask to drop the Bomb with them.

name: Sympathizer
ability: A Townsfolk is Evil, but thinks they are Good. You copy their ability, and the Demon knows them. [1 Townsfolk is Evil Defector]

name: LIZARD (O)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Jolly Lad
ability: One of your living neighbours is drunk, even if dead. Each night, the other neighbour may become drunk instead.

name: Patient 0
ability: Townsfolk that choose you will be drunk until dusk. Townsfolk that haven chosen you twice may die. If you are executed, you keep your ability.

name: Slanderer
ability: Each day, publicly guess a unique player's character: the first time you guess a Good player's character incorrectly, you learn this. The coming night, and you both might be simultaneously executed at any time.

name: Echo Chamber
ability: Each night*, learn a statement another player was mad about yesterday: you are mad that this is true, otherwise you might die tonight. While dead, a player might act twice but might die at any time.

name: Night Owl
ability: Once, during the day, visit the Storyteller: you die and tonight will be skipped, but the Demon may act twice tomorrow.

name: Carpenter
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): if not the Demon, they don't wake tonight.

name: Author
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player (not yourself) and a Good character they become (if not in play).

name: Templar
ability: You start knowing two people, both of which are not and are immune to becoming the Demon. Each night, choose someone: they cannot become the Demon tonight.

name: Clown
ability: Each night*, choose someone: you learn a riddle about them.

name: Statistician
ability: Each night, learn a statistic concerning the gamestate.

name: Chamberlain
ability: Each night, choose someone: when you die, you learn how many are Evil.

name: Optimist
ability: If you are mad about nothing going wrong, something good might happen. You learn a clue about this.

name: Lawyer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player to be safe from execution the following day. If they are executed and it fails, you have your ability back.

name: Jailor
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: you learn their character and they might die.

name: Demonologist
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: you become their alignment and may choose a character of that alignment (not a Demon) to gain the ability of.

name: Corsair
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they and only they die.

name: Shipwright
ability: Once per game, at during the day, visit the Storyteller to learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither. If your team is losing, you may propose a change to the gamestate that the Storyteller may decide to veto.

name: Navigator
ability: Each night*, you provide the Storyteller a statement that is either true or false: they will provide a statement that is of the same truthfulness.

name: Quartermaster
ability: You and an aligned player start knowing each other.

name: Jester
ability: You believe you are, have the ability of, and register as an Evil Demon. [-1 Outsider, -1 Demon]

name: Trapezist
ability: Each night*, if either of your neighbors are drunk or poisoned, you die. You learn who was drunk or poisoned and how.

name: Turncoat
ability: You believe you are and have the ability of an in-play Minion. You and the Minion you believe you are do not know the Demon and other Minions, and vice versa. You learn you are the Turncoat if you die.

name: Officer
ability: Each night*, choose someone: their ability will be redirected to help their team. Targeting a role that acts during the day will redirect if they use their ability the coming day. Your ability may fail if it causes a paradox.

name: Shuttle Driver
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn who they should choose to best help their team.
flavor: Shuttle's here! Leaving in 20!

name: Founder
ability: Every night*, someone knows you are the Founder. [+The Mercenary]

otherNightReminder: Wake and collectively choose a player
name: Acolyte
ability: Each night*, living Acolytes choose a player & learn 1 character for each, 1 being correct. 1 Acolyte might be evil [+1 or +2 Acolytes]

name: Medic
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they cannot die tonight.
flavor: The animals of this woods are dangerous. The wounds I've had to patch up...

name: Ranger
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn a player they chose. If they chose nobody or are the Demon, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Leave nothing but footprints, they say. Well, tire tracks are close enough.

name: Falconer
ability: Each night, choose a living player. If your previously chosen player is dead, learn their character.
flavor: The stench of death really gets the falcons in a stir. They often hunt the smaller scavengers that surround corpses.

name: Bird Watcher
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn a hint about their character.
flavor: What birds fly above someone can tell a great lot about what they're up to.

name: Hawkeye
ability: Each night*, choose a player: learn on a scale of 1-5 how much they lied yesterday. If they didn't lie, this info is arbitrary.
flavor: Constantly watching is the best way to sniff out lies.

firstNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise
otherNightReminder: Learn the character type of the marked and then move one clockwise

ability: One player starts marked with 'Census'. Each night, learn the character type that is marked, and then the mark moves once clockwise (skipping Travelers).

ability: Each night, choose a player: they are sober and receive true information or they are drunk or poisoned until dusk.

name: Forager
ability: One player starts with the Forage token. Each night, learn a player: they learned a hint about who holds the Forage token. Once per game, during the day, publicly guess who holds the Forage token: if correct, your team wins.

name: Ambassador
ability: You are immune to all abilities. If the Demon chooses not to act, you malfunction this game. Once per game at night*, you may become a Traveler.

name: President
ability: Each day, you may publicly make a promise. If a player catches you breaking a promise, you can’t vote today. If none catch you, you switch teams. [No starting info]

name: Celebrity
ability: Each night*, until dusk, a player who was “mad” about everything you said today acts twice.

name: Interpol
ability: Each day, you may interrogate the players involved about any one whisper. If any are executed today, you learn whether any of them lied to you.

name: United Nations
ability: Each day, if all living players vote to ratify you, you run nominations, and you may change the nomination and voting rules, except on yourself.

name: Spymaster
ability: Each night*, players may secretly message you. Then, you may choose one who did: they change characters.

name: LIZARD (Trav)
ability: Choose an amount of Base Four characters of each character type: you have a mutation of one of their abilities.

name: Barnacle
ability: Each night*, learn the character of someone who voted today: they might die.
